text:
setclasspath.sh does not actually export variables such as CLASSPATH for example.
As a result tools.jar is not in the classpath and when tomcat starts up it reports
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSP

Most people have found a workaround but copying tools.jar to the common/lib.

Appending to the script statement like
export CLASSPATH
solves the problem.
creator: vadim.marchenko@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
This works for me (and many others) without this. It is probably a symptom of
some other issue with your environment. The users list is the place to seek
further help.
